cells.name: Assassin`s Vigor
cells.description: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part.
cells.level01: Heal 50 when you break a part
cells.level02: Heal 100 when you break a part
cells.level03: Heal 150 when you break a part
cells.level04: Heal 200 when you break a part
cells.level05: Heal 250 when you break a part
cells.level06: Heal 300 when you break a part

cells.name: Bloodless
cells.description: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 50%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 80%
cells.level04: Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 50% Immune to Wounded status
cells.level05: Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 80% Immune to Wounded status
cells.level06: Immune to Wounded status Immune to Crippling Wound status

cells.name: Fireproof
cells.description: Protects against being set on fire.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 10%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 20%
cells.level03: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 40%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 60%
cells.level05: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 80%
cells.level06: Immune to being set on fire.

cells.name: Fortress
cells.description: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.
cells.level01: Grants a 10 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level02: Grants a 20 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level03: Grants a 40 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level04: Grants a 60 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level05: Grants a 80 health shield after not getting hit for 10s
cells.level06: Grants a 100 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

cells.name: Insulated
cells.description: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 25%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 50%
cells.level03: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75% Reduces knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.
cells.level05: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75% Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.
cells.level06: Immune to Shocked status Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.

cells.name: Nine Lives
cells.description: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.
cells.level04: +12% chance to halve incoming damage The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400
cells.level05: +16% chance to halve incoming damage The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400
cells.level06: +20% chance to halve incoming damage The first time you would be knocked out, stay up and heal for 400, and become empowered for 10 seconds

cells.name: Shellshock Resist
cells.description: Protects against the explosion damage and status effect Shellshock.
cells.level01: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 10%
cells.level02: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 20%
cells.level03: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 40%
cells.level04: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 60%
cells.level05: Reduces Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect duration by 80%
cells.level06: Immune to Shell Shocked explosion damage and status effect

cells.name: Sturdy
cells.description: Prevents being staggered on a cooldown.
cells.level01: Prevents you from being staggered (120 second cooldown)
cells.level02: Prevents you from being staggered (100 second cooldown)
cells.level03: Prevents you from being staggered (80 second cooldown)
cells.level04: Prevents you from being staggered (60 second cooldown)
cells.level05: Prevents you from being staggered (40 second cooldown)
cells.level06: Prevents you from being staggered (15 second cooldown)

cells.name: Tough
cells.description: Increases Max Health.

cells.name: Warmth
cells.description: Protects against Chilled and Frozen status effects.
cells.level01: Reduces duration of Frozen status by 30%
cells.level02: Reduces duration of Frozen status by 60%
cells.level04: Reduces duration of Chilled status by 30% Immune to being Frozen
cells.level05: Reduces duration of Chilled status by 60% Immune to being Frozen
cells.level06: Immune to being Frozen Immune to being Chilled

cells.name: Agility
cells.description: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.

cells.name: Conditioning
cells.description: Increases Stamina Regen.

cells.name: Endurance
cells.description: Increases Max Stamina.

cells.name: Evasion
cells.description: Increases the time you are invincible when dodging.

cells.name: Fleet Footed
cells.description: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.

cells.name: Nimble
cells.description: Restores Stamina when dodging through behemoth attacks.

cells.name: Swift
cells.description: Increases Movement Speed when your weapon is sheathed.

cells.name: Aetherhunter
cells.description: Increases damage against aether charged Behemoths.

cells.name: Deconstruction
cells.description: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.

cells.name: Knockout King
cells.description: Percent increase to Stagger damage.

cells.name: Overpower
cells.description: Increases damage against staggered Behemoths.

cells.name: Pacifier
cells.description: Increases Stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.

cells.name: Rage
cells.description: Increases your damage when your health is low.

cells.name: Ragehunter
cells.description: Increases damage against enraged Behemoths.

cells.name: Sharpened
cells.description: Percent increase to part damage.

cells.name: Acidic
cells.description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.
cells.level01: Converts 30% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level02: Converts 40% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level03: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage
cells.level04: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +10 % Part damage
cells.level05: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +15 % Part damage
cells.level06: Converts 50% of Part Damage to Wound Damage +20 % Part damage

cells.name: Barbed
cells.description: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.

cells.name: Bladestorm
cells.description: Adds a flat amount of Part damage on hit.

cells.name: Cunning
cells.description: Grants a chance to deal double damage.

cells.name: Evasive Fury
cells.description: Temporarily increases attack speed when dodging through a Behemoth's attack.

cells.name: Merciless
cells.description: Increases Wound damage against staggered Behemoths.

cells.name: Savagery
cells.description: Increases damage against Wounded parts.

cells.name: Wild Frenzy
cells.description: Increases Attack Speed when at low health.

cells.name: Weighted Strikes
cells.description: Adds a flat amount of Stagger damage on hit. At later ranks, allows more weapon attacks to interrupt.

cells.name: Aetherborne
cells.description: Increases the benefits of using aether vents.

cells.name: Aetheric Attunement
cells.description: Percent increase to Lantern Charge gained from attacks.

cells.name: Aetheric Frenzy
cells.description: Gains a flat amount of Lantern Charge on each weapon hit.

cells.name: Energized
cells.description: Increases weapon meter gain rate.

cells.name: Medic
cells.description: Improves your ability to revive allies.

cells.name: Stunning Vigour
cells.description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth is staggered.

cells.name: Vampiric
cells.description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth part is Wounded.
